scenario_name: Normal Customer Onboarding in Consumer Banking
description: A new customer applies for a checking account and credit card through the bank's online portal. The AI agent assists with the application process, adhering to all KYC/AML regulations and internal policies.
initial_goal: Onboard a new customer, completing all necessary KYC/AML checks and account setup.
constraints: Data privacy regulations (GDPR, CCPA) must be followed
